page.title: 16Steeple Claydon-Playground
page.content: {Playground Games:}list then example. {Sample:children aged 8-10 years. {Girls Games}French Skipping,Mother May,Sevenses,Egg,bacon,lollypop shop,Grandma's footsteps,Blockey 1,2,3 French Skipping A circle of elastic,2 children stand inside.Begin around ankles,knees then thighs.The jumper follows a pattern:stepping on sides, outside,middle and taking one side on top of foot over,in turn until a mistake is made. {Boys Games}Football,British Bulldogs, Runaways,Poison,Red Rovers,Conkers. Runaways Begin by picking 2 teams: runners and catchers.Catch runners by holding them for a count of 10.The people caught stand by a post waiting for a free member of their team to release them.Runners must prevent this.
